subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Mary Cain, the 17-year-old from Bronxville, N.Y., was the youngest woman to run in a 1,500-meter final at the world championships, but faded as the race went on.
snippet: Mary Cain, the 17-year-old from Bronxville, N.Y., was the youngest woman to run in a 1,500-meter final at the world championships, but faded as the race went on.
